pages.text: $(o)If you want to put up a custom poster, wallpaper, sign, etc, the easiest way(relatively speaking...) would be to put up a Picture Sign! $(br2)Using any vanilla sign, you can start the first line with $(br)!PS: (exclamation point to start, space afterward), then add a URL afterward, which you can split across the next two lines.
$(o)Your best bet is to upload the image to Imgur. If you do, you can use a shortcut for the sign, looking like : $(br2)!PS: imgur:xxxxx.png, where xxxxx is the file name in the url.
